body:
Hi all, I am getting an error using the psychrometric chart with values imported from a csv file that I don't really understand.. Runtime error (TypeErrorException): unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'str' and 'int' Traceback:
line 931, in colorMesh, "<string>"
line 1819, in main, "<string>"
line 1981, in script
line 4384, in calcHumidRatio, "<string>" I don't understand where this could come from. Please see attached a file with the issue. Bests Aurelien
